entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16 except 19 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 16 except 19 near the Trans-Canada Highway. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
